title: I counted the number of friends who are putting on Rainbow Fluft icon
body:
Out of 318 human beings on the friend list,

9 people are putting it on including myself.

that's about 3%.

Glad to know there are some other human beings out there who support non-traditional views on procreation.

I am not alone.


The planet is overpopulated.

Pollution is getting out of control.

I do not think there is a virtue in procreation.

I am glad Riot gave an oppotunity for the oppressed to represent their identity.

Thank you Riot.
